data.system_settings: iPhone 8 +, iOS 11.2.5 (PB4) and iPad Air 1st Generation, iOS 11.1.2
data.actual_result: Role is not able to return there, if you drop it, it'll automatically jump to the bottom.
data.expected_result: Role should be able to return to its previous slot (highest)
data.short_description: Cannot Redrag Role to its original slot after moving
data.steps_to_repro: - Kill your app, then restart it. - Go to your server that you have the following permissions: Manage Role (could need Manage Server, Manage Channel, and View Audit Logs in case) - Go to Server Settings, then Roles - Click and hold onto the highest role, then try to drag it up and down (or you could hold it above another role then try to move it back) This may take multiple times, and require some playing around before you will see the said bug.
